short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension enables UI3 Beta for Figma for all users, without the need to wait on the waitlist.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Note: This extension only works in web browsers and does not enable AI features.

This extension is open source and available at https://github.com/Inclushe/figma-ui3
